$ALPP 

Rest assured that when the buying of RCA — big plans are being conjured up behind the scenes.  The deal with Elecjet and of course the Vayu drone technology.  This is a technology stock you do not want to pass on.  

Remind yourself of just how powerful technology companies can become.  We can but name a few such as the likes of $TSLA $AMZN $AAPL.    

There is so much more happening at this holding/parent company.   If you are up to date you will know that talks with Elecjet to 7 months in 2021.   There is so much you and I don’t know but will understand all in good time. 

Tesla is a client of Alpine’s and Alpine is doing g prototype work right now for Apple.   Connect the dots and remains steadfast in your convictions with this equity.  

Happy days.   

Long-term and long term only.
